commands.INSERTPDFSHEETS: Inserts all pages of a selected multi-page PDF as underlays in a grid layout.
commands.GETSUMFROMTEXTEXPORT: Extracts room types and square footage from selected text objects and exports the combined data to a JSON file.
commands.GETSUMFROMTEXT: Sums numerical values from selected text objects, handling various formats including VA ratings.
commands.CALCULATEAREAS: Calculates areas of selected polylines and adds text labels with the area in square feet at the center of each.
